body:
#### Overview of the Issue

When starting up a tablet with SHA ae7b400 we see the following:

```
I0410 01:15:26.662889       8 binlog_streamer.go:181] stream ended @ <nil>, err = <nil>
panic: runtime error: slice bounds out of range

goroutine 515 [running]:
vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql.printJSONString(0xc001546c3b, 0xb6, 0x1bb, 0x0, 0xc00104bc70)
vitess-build/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql/binlog_event_json.go:353 +0x17e
vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql.printJSONValue(0x94110c, 0xc001546c3b, 0xb6, 0x1bb, 0x12c5800, 0xc00104bc70, 0x0, 0x0)
vitess-build/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql/binlog_event_json.go:98 +0x562
vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql.printJSONValueEntry(0xc001546ae9, 0x208, 0x30d, 0x57, 0x12c5800, 0xc00104bc70, 0x0, 0x0)
vitess-build/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql/binlog_event_json.go:215 +0x2dc
vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql.printJSONObject(0xc001546ae9, 0x208, 0x30d, 0xc000e8ca00, 0xc00104bc70, 0x40e1c8, 0x70)
vitess-build/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql/binlog_event_json.go:139 +0x430
vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql.printJSONValue(0x1071500, 0xc001546ae9, 0x208, 0x30d, 0x1, 0xc00104bc70, 0x1, 0x117625c)
vitess-build/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql/binlog_event_json.go:74 +0x126
vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql.printJSONData(0xc001546ae8, 0x209, 0x30e, 0x0, 0xa, 0xc0010476b0, 0x1, 0x8)
vitess-build/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql/binlog_event_json.go:65 +0x93
vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql.CellValue(0xc001546aa5, 0x34d, 0x351, 0x3f, 0x81e000400f5, 0x1, 0xc0010476b0, 0x1, 0x8, 0x1, ...)
vitess-build/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/mysql/binlog_event_rbr.go:811 +0xb3d
vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/binlog.writeValuesAsSQL(0xc0015cacc0, 0xc000d97c80, 0xc000e8d9a0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x1, 0xc0012489d0, 0xd, 0x113, 0xc00010814d, ...)
vitess-build/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/binlog/binlog_streamer.go:752 +0x598
vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/binlog.(*Streamer).appendInserts(0xc000dbd860, 0xc001d1c000, 0x1, 0xa, 0xc000d97c80, 0xc000e8d9a0, 0x26, 0x2b, 0xc000dcdc00)
vitess-build/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/binlog/binlog_streamer.go:610 +0x1f8
vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/binlog.(*Streamer).parseEvents(0xc000dbd860, 0x12d9300, 0xc000d7c140, 0xc00024f500, 0xc000e240c0, 0xc00024f500, 0x0, 0x0)
vitess-build/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/binlog/binlog_streamer.go:534 +0x19b0
vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/binlog.(*Streamer).Stream(0xc000dbd860, 0x12d9300, 0xc000d7c140, 0x0, 0x0)
vitess-build/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/binlog/binlog_streamer.go:233 +0x201
vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/vttablet/tabletserver.(*ReplicationWatcher).Process(0xc0002367c0, 0x12d9300, 0xc000d7c140, 0x1d5e800)
vitess-build/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/vttablet/tabletserver/replication_watcher.go:138 +0x1ac
created by vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/vttablet/tabletserver.(*ReplicationWatcher).Open
vitess-build/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/vttablet/tabletserver/replication_watcher.go:97 +0xcd
```

I'll post a schema + sample data when I've got a clear and minimal reproduction.
title: panic: binlog_streamer.go:181] stream ended
